text:
Mineral Resources Development (Revocation) Order 2007

I make the following order under section 5(4) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

18 May 2007

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Revocation) Order 2007 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Legislation revoked
    The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is revoked.

SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation revoked

Clause 3

Mineral Resources Development (Exemption) Order 2006 (No. 43 of 2006)  Mineral Resources Development (Exemption) Order (No. 2) 2006 (No. 44 of 2006)
                                                                                                                                                    


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 June 2007

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
